ANATOMIST.Definition: someone who studies anatomy, the study of the structure of the human body

FUTURIST.Definition: someone who thinking about and studies the future

TREAT.Definition: something special that is given to someone

POLYMATH.Definition: someone who has a lot of knowledge about different subjects

NOTARY.Definition: someone who has the power to officially witness a legal document

PEASANT.Definition: someone who owns or rents a small piece of land

ILLEGITIMATE.Definition: if you are illegitimate, your parents weren't married when you were born

FOOTSTEPS.Definition: if you follow in someone's footsteps, you do what they do

APPRENTICESHIP.Definition: a period where a (normally) young person works for a skilled person in order to learn how to do that job

WORKSHOP.Definition: a building or room where artists work

HUB.Definition: centre, place where lots of activity happens

APOCRYPHAL.Definition: well known but probably not true

COMMISSION.Definition: a commission for a painting is when someone pays you to do it

REPUTATION.Definition: if you have a reputation for something, you are known because of it

ASSUMPTIONS.Definition: things that you believe to be true

OUTCAST.Definition: someone who doesn't fit into society

MISFIT.Definition: someone who isn't suited to a situation, or isn't accepted

SMUDGE.Definition: if you smudge ink or writing, it becomes dirty and unclear

DISSECT.Definition: cut up (especially of a dead body)

SPINES.Definition: the line of bones in the centre of your back

ANATOMICAL.Definition: relating to anatomy, the study of the human body

RECREATE.Definition: to make something exist (again) in a different form

CREDITED.Definition: given credit for, thought to be the person responsible for something

PARACHUTE.Definition: a piece of equipment used to jump safely out of a plane

FUNDAMENTAL.Definition: the most basic and important parts of something

ELICITED.Definition: succeed in getting a reaction from

FOREHEAD.Definition: the part of your head between your eyes and your hairline

TRIBUTE.Definition: something you do to express your admiration for someone or something

NOBODY.Definition: a nobody is someone who is unimportant

PIECE TOGETHER.Definition: if you piece together something, you put together the information you know to discover the truth about it
